Senior Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business. "We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer . Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. As president of the Server and Tools Business, Satya Nadella will oversee the overall strategy, engineering, marketing and product development for Microsoft's server, tools and cloud platform efforts. But on Monday Chrysler chief executive Sergio Marchionne said that industry-wide sales had fallen off in the final weeks of the month, which typically account for the bulk of sales. We've seen a softening of the US market in the last couple of weeks, Sergio Marchionne told reporters on a conference call to discuss Chrysler's fourth-quarter results.
